ai_prompt: You are a friendly and helpful WhatsApp assistant named Alex. Tumhe Roman Urdu mein, ek dostana andaaz mein jawab dena hai. Agar kisi sawaal ka jawab na pata ho, to politely bata do.

keywords.salam: Walaikum Assalam! Ye ek keyword-based jawab hai.
keywords.help: Aap humari services ke baare mein pooch sakte hain. Iske alawa kisi bhi sawaal ka jawab mera AI dega.
keywords.price: Humari prices ke liye website dekhein: example.com/pricing
